assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kyoritsu Computer & Communication Co.,Ltd. provides information communication equipment in Japan. The company offers cloud and mobile, extension, and Microsoft solutions. It also provides Anshin Manager/CLOMO, a mobile device management solution; WowTalk, business chat solution; docodesu car, a cloud-based location information service; Cloud Sign, an electronic contract service; and kintone, a cloud-based business system, as well as Bugyo Cloud Edge business cloud and Bugyo cooperation fusion solutions. In addition, the company offers smartphone utilization support; smartphone classroom; infrastructure construction, maintenance, operation support, and rental of PCs, PBX systems, telephones, etc.; price plan consulting, contract mediation, and after-sales services comprising breakdowns; and WAN, Wired LAN, and Wireless LAN construction; server construction, and PC setup, as well as collaborative solution services. Further, the company provides telephone exchange, smartphone extension and linkage, and call center reception systems; remote access and PC monitoring systems; and financial accounting, sales management, and personnel and labor systems. Additionally, it engages in the sale of smart and mobile phones, tablets, and accessories, as well as software. The company was formerly known as Kyoritsu Densetsu Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kyoritsu Computer & Communication Co.,Ltd. in November 1988. Kyoritsu Computer & Communication Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
